text: Geoff James Nugent (born 14 February 1977), better known as Jim Jefferies, is an Australian stand-up comedian, actor and writer. He is well known in the United Kingdom and the United States. He also has a number of Netflix specials. In 2017, he began starring in the Comedy Central talk show The Jim Jefferies Show. == Early life == Jefferies was born in February 1977 in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. His father was a cabinet maker and maintenance worker, his mother was a teacher. He moved to Perth to study musical theatre and classical music at the Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts. James began his career in stand-up comedy several months before completing his degree. He relocated to Sydney and then to the UK. == Familly == He has two older brothers: Scott, an investment banker, and Daniel, an inspector in the New South Wales Police Force's Public Order and Riot Squad. He has a son, Hank, with actress Kate Luyben. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Sydney Category:Australian comedians Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Writers from Sydney
title: Jim Jefferies (comedian)
